title: Modular Anime Character (Fantasy RPG Male)
shortDescription: Mix and match your own anime character from modular parts!Make your own anime character! This pack includes modular parts that can be colored as you prefer.You can also make your own twist to the characters by making adjustments to their textures to your liking.This character's face has morph targets for expressions and edited normals for that anime look.Let your imagination loose
description: Mix and match your own anime character from modular parts!Make your own anime character! This pack includes modular parts that can be colored as you prefer.You can also make your own twist to the characters by making adjustments to their textures to your liking.This character's face has morph targets for expressions and edited normals for that anime look.Let your imagination loose. Have fun!Features:78 parts121 textures (128x128, 512x512, 1024x1024, 2048x2048)2 Shaders8 character animations for basic movement20 000 - 50 000 verts per characterRig compatible with Humanoid animation type (But animal ears, tail, cape and dress won't animate if using Humanoid Skelly)
sourceFile: Modular Anime Character Fantasy RPG Male.unitypackage
